column1: Local Foods////$11 for a sandwich sent from the Sandwich Gods themselves and my choice of not one
column2: but TWO sides?? I don't know about you
column4: that's a steal. I got the potato salad and chips. They were good but not amazing
column5: which makes me question why I'm giving them 5 stars now... but I'm so blown away by the sandwich that nothing else really even matters. I've heard only good things about the quinoa and kale
column6: so I'll definitely be back soon and try those next time!
